This sample has been made possible thanks to the support of third party creators. The project uses following assets:

Modular Terrain Pack - https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-terrain-pack
Modular Village Pack - https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-village-pack
Low Poly Space Pack - https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-space-pack
